title: My Observational Diary of Elena Evoy - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manhwa   Cute Story   Different Social Status   European Ambience   Magic   Multiple POV   Multiple Protagonists   Nobles   Royalty   Smart Couple
author: Myongcho   명초
description:
It was no doubt that Johann would be the top student at the Academy. Face blessed by God, a warm and friendly personality, and a discerning talent in both sports and academics.

This position, however, was taken by someone else.

“Miss Elena, congratulations on attaining top seat.”

“Thank you.”

Elena, who didn’t seem to know his name was different.

She didn’t speak to him, even when most would’ve taken the opportunity to do so.

“Do you have anything more to say?”

Johann’s self-esteem shattered when he realized she didn’t even know who he was.

From that moment on, Johann started to observe Elena.>
